sql.where: 1=1 AND dr_user.user_id = #{userId} AND dr_user.user_telephone = #{userTelephone} AND dr_user.user_password = #{userPassword} AND dr_user.user_salt = #{userSalt} AND dr_user.user_open_platform = #{userOpen_platform} AND dr_user.user_platform_openid = #{userPlatform_openid} AND dr_user.user_platform_lcopenid = #{userPlatform_lcopenid} AND dr_user.user_platform_unionid = #{userPlatform_unionid} AND dr_user.user_nickname = #{userNickname} AND dr_user.user_avatar = #{userAvatar} AND dr_user.user_email = #{userEmail} AND dr_user.user_realname = #{userRealname} AND dr_user.user_cert_no = #{userCert_no} AND dr_user.user_cert_type = #{userCert_type} AND dr_user.user_identification_status = #{userIdentification_status} AND dr_user.user_pay_password = #{userPay_password} AND dr_user.user_pay_salt = #{userPay_salt} AND dr_user.user_bank_code = #{userBank_code} AND dr_user.user_bank_account = #{userBank_account} AND dr_user.user_bank_account_owner_name = #{userBank_account_owner_name} AND dr_user.user_bank_telephone = #{userBank_telephone} AND dr_user.user_card_type = #{userCard_type} AND dr_user.user_card_attribute = #{userCard_attribute} AND dr_user.user_bank_province = #{userBank_province} AND dr_user.user_bank_city = #{userBank_city} AND dr_user.user_bank_branch = #{userBank_branch} AND dr_user.user_bank_status = #{userBank_status} AND dr_user.user_sina_card_id = #{userSina_card_id} AND dr_user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket = #{userSina_bind_card_ticket} AND dr_user.user_register_ip = #{userRegister_ip} AND dr_user.user_register_time = #{userRegister_time} AND dr_user.user_first_login = #{userFirst_login} AND dr_user.user_yield_report = #{userYield_report} AND dr_user.user_status = #{userStatus} AND dr_user.user_createtime = #{userCreatetime} AND dr_user.user_modifytime = #{userModifytime}

1=1 AND user_id = #{userId} AND user_telephone = #{userTelephone} AND user_password = #{userPassword} AND user_salt = #{userSalt} AND user_open_platform = #{userOpen_platform} AND user_platform_openid = #{userPlatform_openid} AND user_platform_lcopenid = #{userPlatform_lcopenid} AND user_platform_unionid = #{userPlatform_unionid} AND user_nickname = #{userNickname} AND user_avatar = #{userAvatar} AND user_email = #{userEmail} AND user_realname = #{userRealname} AND user_cert_no = #{userCert_no} AND user_cert_type = #{userCert_type} AND user_identification_status = #{userIdentification_status} AND user_pay_password = #{userPay_password} AND user_pay_salt = #{userPay_salt} AND user_bank_code = #{userBank_code} AND user_bank_account = #{userBank_account} AND user_bank_account_owner_name = #{userBank_account_owner_name} AND user_bank_telephone = #{userBank_telephone} AND user_card_type = #{userCard_type} AND user_card_attribute = #{userCard_attribute} AND user_bank_province = #{userBank_province} AND user_bank_city = #{userBank_city} AND user_bank_branch = #{userBank_branch} AND user_bank_status = #{userBank_status} AND user_sina_card_id = #{userSina_card_id} AND user_sina_bind_card_ticket = #{userSina_bind_card_ticket} AND user_register_ip = #{userRegister_ip} AND user_register_time = #{userRegister_time} AND user_first_login = #{userFirst_login} AND user_yield_report = #{userYield_report} AND user_status = #{userStatus} AND user_createtime = #{userCreatetime} AND user_modifytime = #{userModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_user AS dr_user

SELECT dr_user.user_id as userId, dr_user.user_telephone as userTelephone, dr_user.user_password as userPassword, dr_user.user_salt as userSalt, dr_user.user_open_platform as userOpen_platform, dr_user.user_platform_openid as userPlatform_openid, dr_user.user_platform_lcopenid as userPlatform_lcopenid, dr_user.user_platform_unionid as userPlatform_unionid, dr_user.user_nickname as userNickname, dr_user.user_avatar as userAvatar, dr_user.user_email as userEmail, dr_user.user_realname as userRealname, dr_user.user_cert_no as userCert_no, dr_user.user_cert_type as userCert_type, dr_user.user_identification_status as userIdentification_status, dr_user.user_pay_password as userPay_password, dr_user.user_pay_salt as userPay_salt, dr_user.user_bank_code as userBank_code, dr_user.user_bank_account as userBank_account, dr_user.user_bank_account_owner_name as userBank_account_owner_name, dr_user.user_bank_telephone as userBank_telephone, dr_user.user_card_type as userCard_type, dr_user.user_card_attribute as userCard_attribute, dr_user.user_bank_province as userBank_province, dr_user.user_bank_city as userBank_city, dr_user.user_bank_branch as userBank_branch, dr_user.user_bank_status as userBank_status, dr_user.user_sina_card_id as userSina_card_id, dr_user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket as userSina_bind_card_ticket, dr_user.user_register_ip as userRegister_ip, dr_user.user_register_time as userRegister_time, dr_user.user_first_login as userFirst_login, dr_user.user_yield_report as userYield_report, dr_user.user_status as userStatus, dr_user.user_createtime as userCreatetime, dr_user.user_modifytime as userModifytime FROM dr_user AS dr_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT dr_user.user_id as userId, dr_user.user_telephone as userTelephone, dr_user.user_password as userPassword, dr_user.user_salt as userSalt, dr_user.user_open_platform as userOpen_platform, dr_user.user_platform_openid as userPlatform_openid, dr_user.user_platform_lcopenid as userPlatform_lcopenid, dr_user.user_platform_unionid as userPlatform_unionid, dr_user.user_nickname as userNickname, dr_user.user_avatar as userAvatar, dr_user.user_email as userEmail, dr_user.user_realname as userRealname, dr_user.user_cert_no as userCert_no, dr_user.user_cert_type as userCert_type, dr_user.user_identification_status as userIdentification_status, dr_user.user_pay_password as userPay_password, dr_user.user_pay_salt as userPay_salt, dr_user.user_bank_code as userBank_code, dr_user.user_bank_account as userBank_account, dr_user.user_bank_account_owner_name as userBank_account_owner_name, dr_user.user_bank_telephone as userBank_telephone, dr_user.user_card_type as userCard_type, dr_user.user_card_attribute as userCard_attribute, dr_user.user_bank_province as userBank_province, dr_user.user_bank_city as userBank_city, dr_user.user_bank_branch as userBank_branch, dr_user.user_bank_status as userBank_status, dr_user.user_sina_card_id as userSina_card_id, dr_user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket as userSina_bind_card_ticket, dr_user.user_register_ip as userRegister_ip, dr_user.user_register_time as userRegister_time, dr_user.user_first_login as userFirst_login, dr_user.user_yield_report as userYield_report, dr_user.user_status as userStatus, dr_user.user_createtime as userCreatetime, dr_user.user_modifytime as userModifytime FROM dr_user AS dr_user
${orderby}
